resources.string: Group sms forwarder uses your phones native groups and contacts. This gives you opportunity to administrate users through androids native contacts.
Purpose of this app is to take over android and turn it to message central.
It is highly recommended to dedicate a separate phone to this app.

WARNING: 1. This service may cost you money (sms prices), especially if receivers are from out of country, and you have turned feedback on. It is highly recommended to use this app with free sms phone.
In order to use this app you have to:
- register this phone to a google account - gives you option to administrate users and groups through gmail/google contacts.
- for backup of SMSs just install SMS Backup+ app - no further actions needed.

- Sms functions (ignore ""): "Signup" Group name and your name, "Resign" Group name and your name, "Create Group" and group name to create a group, to send group message you have to write this: "Groupname" and your message afterwords. Example1: Signup GRP1 James Jackson, Example2: Resign GRP1 James, Example3: GRP1 Hello everybody! Best regards James Jackson
Auto Forwarding is off. Turn forwarding on by pressing forwarder button. This will start SMS Forwarder up and will delete all messages after handling them
In order to signup to a group write: Signup GroupName YourName. In order to resign write: Resign GroupName YourName. In order to send a group message write: GroupName message.
Sorry could not find a group with following name:
You are now signed up to a following group:
You are now resigned from following group:
You already signed to following group:
Respond back to all messages is:
This will activate feedback for all incoming SMSes
When sms forwarding is enabled, phone will listen for incoming sms messages and handle them.
In order to signup to a group write: Signup GroupName YourName. In order to resign write: Resign GroupName YourName. In order to send a group message write: GroupName message.
You are now signed to following group:
You are now resigned from following group:
